name: Andranik Mirzaian
content: Andranik Mirzaian Associate Professor Ph.D. in Computer Science, Princeton University, USA Dept. of EECS York University 4700 Keele Street, Toronto, Ontario, Canada M3J 1P3 Office: Secretary: Fax: E-mail: (416) 736-2100 ext. 70133 (416) 736-5053 (416) 736-5872 andy@yorku.ca (room LAS 2030) (room LAS 1003) Courses: EECS 1019:               Discrete Math for Computer Science    (migrated to eClass) EECS 1520:               Computer Use: Fundamentals                (migrated to eClass) EECS 2101: Fundamentals of Data Structures          (migrated to eClass) EECS 3101: Design and Analysis of Algorithms      (migrated to eClass) EECS 4101/5101:         Advanced Data Structures (migrated to eClass) EECS 6114: Computational  Geometry EECS 6118: Optimization Courseware:     AAW -  Algorithmics Animation Workshop Research Interests:   Design and analysis of algorithms and complexity theory: Optimization: Linear Programming, Combinatorial and Convex Optimization Computational Geometry: Triangulations, Hamiltonian Visibility Graphs, Map Labelling, GIS Selected publication list Spiritual
